error_details.explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '+' instead.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 75
The nuts are $25 and he has a $5 coupon, so the nuts are on sale for $25+$5 = $<<25+5=30>>30
He eats 1 oz of nuts every evening and the bag has 40 oz of nuts, so it has 40/1 = <<40/1=40>>40 1 oz servings
The nuts cost $30 and there are 40 servings per bag, so his snack is $30/40 = $<<30/40=0.75>>0.75 per serving
